name: Kaiten Sushi VR
description:
Kaiten Sushi VR is a game that you can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

Make sushi and serve to your customers within the time limit and make them happy.

There are four game modes:

- Endless Mode: No time limit but if you make five customers angry, game will over.

- Time Limit Mode: In 10 minutes, serve as much sushi as possible.

- Ninja Mode: The ninja is coming to kitchen and attacks you. Protect yourself from the ninja.

- Free Mode: There is no limit. You can practice your skills in this mode.

Enjoy!
